definitions.text: consider in detail and subject to an analysis in order to discover essential features or meaning
examples: analyze the evidence in a criminal trial

definitions.text: observe, check out, and look over carefully or inspect
examples: The customs agent examined the baggage
I must see your passport before you can enter the country

definitions.text: question or examine thoroughly and closely
put to the test, as for its quality, or give experimental use to
examples: This approach has been tried with good results
